00028 #define NativeDisplayType HDC
00029 #define NativeWindowType  HWND
00030 #define NativePixmapType  HBITMAP
00031 
00032 typedef int          EGLint;
00033 typedef unsigned int EGLBoolean;
00034 typedef void *       EGLConfig;
